title: How to Make Chicken Potato Salad

steps.headline: Set the potatoes in a large pot with water.
steps.description: Boil them until they are tender when pricked with a fork.

steps.headline: Combine the asparagus and green beans to the boiling pot.
steps.description: Continue boiling for a few minutes, about 5 to 8, until the vegetables become tender and crisp.

steps.headline: Drain the vegetables and leave it on the side to cool.
Add the vegetables to a salad bowl.
steps.description: Add the scallions, chicken, and salad greens to the bowl.

steps.headline: Whisk the salad dressing ingredients together in a medium sized bowl.
Drizzle the dressing mixture on top.
steps.description: Use salad tongs to toss the mixture together.

text: Set the potatoes in a large pot with water. Boil them until they are tender when pricked with a fork. Combine the asparagus and green beans to the boiling pot. Continue boiling for a few minutes, about 5 to 8, until the vegetables become tender and crisp. Drain the vegetables and leave it on the side to cool.  Add the vegetables to a salad bowl. Add the scallions, chicken, and salad greens to the bowl. Whisk the salad dressing ingredients together in a medium sized bowl.  Drizzle the dressing mixture on top. Use salad tongs to toss the mixture together. Finished.
